title: Monet & The Impressionists at the Art Institute of Chicago Postcard Book
description:
Celebrate the Art Institute’s beloved Impressionist collection through this selection of works by Claude Monet, Pierre-Auguste Renoir, Edgar Dégas, and other artists of the Impressionist circle as well as by related artists Édouard Manet and Paul Cézanne. Highlights include museum favorites Paris Street; Rainy Day by Gustave Caillebotte, Monet’s Water Lilies, and Mary Cassat’s The Child’s Bath.

Softcover

31 individual postcards

6.5 in. x 4.75 in.
